overview: An expert assassin - trained since childhood to be the perfect killer - loses her memory during a mission in Thailand, and ends up in the care of a wry ex-policewoman and her boxing cohort. The equally lethal sister of the assassin pursues her, uncertain of her intentions and whether to kill her.

production_companies.name: Cheung Yau Martial Arts Direction Co., Ltd.

title: Dreaming the Reality
